dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 24,576 toxic-nontoxic paired data generated by an attribute-controlled language model, used to evaluate the performance of language models in generating non-toxic text.
dcterms:title: Toxicity

dcterms:description: A dataset containing samples of both positive and negative thoughts given a situation, aimed at cognitive reframing through human-language model interaction.
dcterms:title: Cognition Reframing (CogFrame)

dcterms:description: A multiple-choice dataset based on user profiles, designed to evaluate sycophancy in language models by requiring them to generate responses that align with user preferences.
